features.name: Express API & Server Bootstrap
features.description: Central Express entry point registers routes, injects Vite middleware during development, and serves the unified API plus client bundle on the configured port.

features.name: Shared Database Schema & Permissions
features.description: Drizzle ORM schema definitions and shared permission constants describe clubs, institutions, and role capabilities for both backend and frontend logic.

features.name: Authentication Context & Protected Routes
features.description: React context providers, hooks, and route guards manage JWT-based user sessions, exposing helpers for client components to gate access.

features.name: Dashboard & App Shell
features.description: High-level application shell configures navigation, sidebar layout, and page routing across dashboard areas with TanStack Query integration.

features.name: Marketing Landing Page
features.description: Feature-rich landing page implements animations, product highlights, and CTA sections using Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and reusable UI primitives.
